Class PixelRingList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.image.pixel.PixelRingList

    IslandRingList

    public class PixelRingList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<PixelRing>
    a list of (generally nested) PixelRings generally created elsewhere (PixelIsland)

    pm286

      • extractLocalSummits1

        public Real2Array extractLocalSummits1(LocalSummitList pixelRingListList,
                                       int minNestedRings)
        create local summits from pixelRings The normal pixelRing extraction is essetially the whole "shoreline" of the contour. This method finds the centroids of the new islands at this contour level,
        Parameters:
        pixelRingListList - list of PixelRingLists from different islands
        minNestedRings - lower limit for creating local summits
        Returns:
